dist

Class DiscreteDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • dist.AbstractDistribution
      • dist.DiscreteDistribution
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Distribution, java.io.Serializable, Copyable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleStateDistribution

    public class DiscreteDistribution
extends AbstractDistribution
implements java.io.Serializable, Copyable
    A probabilitiy function for representing single discrete output values
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Guillory gtg008g@mail.gatech.edu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        probabilities - array of probabilitites such that the probabilities of output i is probabilitites[i]
        m - the continuity parameter
